title: Shit players
body: Riot needs to fix there system. Stop putting the players with winning streaks with the players with losing streaks. Put the losing streak players with the other losing streak players. They will get demoted and stop losing. Put the winning streak people together and they will get promoted. The losing streak people dont have to vs them. Getting 4 people in your ranked game that have lost their last 5 games isn't healthy for climbing the ladder. If you think I am wrong please Inlighten me on why this would not work.

replies.body: Because Winning/ losing streaks are not indicative to how good the players are, especially if they just get lucky
Even Faker or any pro players out there have lose streaks.
